section_text_1: Have a safe and interesting trip in our top-of-the-line Mercedes V-Class van! Indulge in our driving services.
section_text_2: Arriving from overseas? Plan to go abroad? Need a local drive? We are here for you: we will take you to the airport, railway/ bus station or to your hotel. All the while taking special care of your luggage.
section_text_3: You expect a visit from business partners? Instead of waiting for them for yourself, give this task to us. Our driver has very good command of English, German and Italian, plus working knowledge of Russian and French. We guarantee comfort and discretion in our luxurious Mercedes 7-passenger V-Class van.
section_text_4: If you have small children, we shall take great care of their safety: simply inform us in advance that a child seat is needed.
